document_data.name: Black Bastion
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Bastion''' was the [[divine realm]] of the [[:category:greater deities|greater power]] [[Bane]], god of strife and tyranny.
document_data.Description:
Bane's fortress was said to have one been the most imperious and terrifying domain in all the Barrens of Doom and Despair. It was said to be so massive that it struck out any lingering light in the barrens' skies.

The magnificent palace was constructed from the darkest metals and wood, like [[adamantine]] and [[ebony]], and adorned with lustrous precious stones like [[jet]] and [[obsidian]].
document_data.Cosmography:
By the the [[Great Wheel cosmology|Great Wheel cosmological model]], the Black Bastion was said to reside in [[Avalas]], the 1{{st}} layer of eternal battleground of [[Acheron]].

Under the [[World Tree cosmology|World Tree]] and [[World Axis cosmology|World Axis]] models, it was situated in the [[Barrens of Doom and Despair]],
document_data.Notable Locations: The only recorded landmark of note within the Black Bastion was Bane's personal throne of skulls.
document_data.Inhabitants:
The Black Bastion housed Bane's personal army, which included [[devil]]s and other extra-planar soldiers that heeded his call for war.

It was also home to the [[beast of Bane|beasts of Bane]], nocturnal monsters that were much more menacing than their mundane kin.
